amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove the mandatory minimum incarceration provisions for sex offenders who fail to register under the provisions of the bill or make false statements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to remove the mandatory minimum incarceration provisions for sex offenders who fail to register under the provisions of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inglis (SC) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 316 (Roll no. 468).
